system.description:
When you make use of the secret techniques taught by your company, choose a spell from below, then mark it. You cannot use a spell while it is marked.

When you Fill Your Belly, remove a mark from one spell. When you Recover, remove all marks on your spells.
system.choices:
• A Way Out: You disappear in a puff of smoke, leaving the scene. You may take any allies within arms' reach with you.
  • A Way In: Tell us about a secret entrance. It's right where you say it is.
  • The Trick: Create a sudden and massive distraction that draws all eyes.
